name: Siege Engineer

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Knowledge (engineering) 5 ranks or Profession (siege engineer) 5 ranks, proficiency with one siege engine.

sections.body: You are considered to be proficient with all siege weapons. Also, when you are crew lead for a siege engine, you do not generate mishaps on the roll of a natural 1.
sections.name: Benefits

sections.body: Each siege engine is an exotic weapon.
sections.name: Normal

description: You are proficient with all siege weaponry.
